      void placeSettlement(VertexLocation vertex, int player)
      Places a settlement on the given vertex, belonging to the indicated player
      void upgradeSettlement(VertexLocation vertex, int player)
      Upgrades the state of the indicated vertex from settlement to city, the player id plays a minor role of action validation, may be removed in the future
